meanings.definition: The front paw of a four-legged animal, such as a dog or cat.
meanings.sent1: The dog used its forepaw to play with the ball.
meanings.sent2: The cat gently touched the yarn with its forepaw.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to high-five with its forepaw.
meanings.sent4: The forepaw of the cat moved gracefully as it stretched.
meanings.sent5: The muddy prints left by the forepaw of the dog were easy to follow.
